      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args,
                java.io.InputStream stdin,
                java.io.OutputStream stdout)
         throws SortException
        Runs the sort application with the specified arguments.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Application
        Parameters:
        args - Array of arguments for the application. Each array element is the path to a file. If no files are specified stdin is used.
        stdin - An InputStream. The input for the command is read from this InputStream if no files are specified.
        stdout - An OutputStream. The output of the command is written to this OutputStream.
        Throws:
        SortException

      • sortFromFiles

        public java.lang.String sortFromFiles(java.lang.Boolean isFirstWordNumber,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isReverseOrder,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isCaseIndependent,
                                      java.lang.String... fileNames)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns string containing the orders of the lines of the specified file
        Specified by:
        sortFromFiles in interface SortInterface
        Parameters:
        isFirstWordNumber - Boolean option to treat the first word of a line as a number
        isReverseOrder - Boolean option to sort in reverse order
        isCaseIndependent - Boolean option to perform case-independent sorting
        fileNames - Array of String of file names
        Returns:
        the expected result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sortInputString

        private void sortInputString(java.lang.Boolean isFirstWordNumber,
                             java.lang.Boolean isReverseOrder,
                             java.lang.Boolean isCaseIndependent,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
        Sorts the input ArrayList based on the given conditions. Invoking this function will mutate the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        isFirstWordNumber - Boolean option to treat the first word of a line as a number
        isReverseOrder - Boolean option to sort in reverse order
        isCaseIndependent - Boolean option to perform case-independent sorting
        input - ArrayList of Strings of lines
